ID: C7HTC14_00
From: One Reach <OneReach@chalhoub.com>
To: 
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-06-13 17:36
Subject: Planned Maintenance – ESXi Host Reboot at D3
--------------------------------------------------
 

 

 <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/> 

 

Dear Colleague,

As part of our continued efforts to enhance infrastructure performance and ensure service reliability, essential maintenance will be carried out on the 

ESXi Host at the D3 location.

 

Date: FRI 13 JUNE 2025
Time: 07:00 PM – 10:00 PM GST (3 hours)
Location: D3

 

Impacted Services:
The following services may experience temporary disruption during the maintenance window:

*	File Share
*	FTP
*	Cisco Telephony
*	VPN
*	Print Server

 

Your understanding and support are appreciated as we work to maintain and improve our service stability.


For support during this period, please raise a ticket via OneReach. You can also check real-time status updates via the Tech&Data System Status & Health <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/>  Dashboard.

 

 

 

This mail was sent to you by

 <https://onereach.chalhoub.com/support/home>
